item.text: For we know that if our earthly house, the tent we live in, is dismantled, we have a building from God, a house not built by human hands, that is eternal in the heavens.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3613">earthly house</st><n id="1" /> we <st data-num="4727" class="">groan</st>, because we <st data-num="1971" class="">desire</st> to <st data-num="1902" class="">put on</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heavenly</st> <st data-num="1902" class="">dwelling</st>,

<st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1065" class="">indeed</st>, after we have <st data-num="1746" class="">put on</st><n id="1" /> our heavenly house,<n id="2" /> we will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="1131" class="">naked</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we <st data-num="4727" class="">groan</st> while we <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> this <st data-num="4636" class="">tent</st>,<n id="1" /> since we are <st data-num="916">weighed down</st>,<n id="2" /> because we do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to be <st data-num="1562" class="">unclothed</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1902" class="">clothed</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> what is <st data-num="2349" class="">mortal</st> may be <st data-num="2666">swallowed up</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> the one who <st data-num="2716" class="">prepared</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="846" class="">very</st> purpose<n id="1" /> is <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, who <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> as a <st data-num="728" class="">down payment</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> we are <st data-num="3842" class="">always</st> <st data-num="2292" class="">full of courage</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> we <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> as long as we are <st data-num="4983">alive</st> <st data-num="1736" class="">here on earth</st><n id="1" /> we are <st data-num="1553" class="">absent</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>—

<st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> we <st data-num="4043" class="">live</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="1491" class="">sight</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Thus</st> we are <st data-num="2292" class="">full of courage</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> would <st data-num="2106" class="">prefer</st> to be <st data-num="1553" class="">away</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1736">at home</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.

<st data-num="1352">So then</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">whether</st> we are <st data-num="1736" class="">alive</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1553" class="">away</st>, we <st data-num="5389">make</st> it our <st data-num="5389" class="">ambition</st> to <st data-num="2101" class="">please</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="2" />
For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ, so that each one may be paid back according to what he has done while in the body, whether good or evil.
Therefore, because we know the fear of the Lord, we try to persuade people, but we are well known to God, and I hope we are well known to your consciences too.

We are <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> trying to <st data-num="4921" class="">commend</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1438" class="">ourselves</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> are <st data-num="1325" class="">giving</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> an <st data-num="874" class="">opportunity</st> to be <st data-num="2745" class="">proud</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">of</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> you may be <st data-num="2192" class="">able</st> to answer those who <st data-num="2744">take pride</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4383">outward appearance</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> in what is <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">if</st> we <st data-num="1839">are out of</st> our <st data-num="1839" class="">minds</st>, it is for <st data-num="2316" class="">God;</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">if</st> we <st data-num="4993">are of sound mind</st>, it is for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> of <st data-num="1520" class="">Christ</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4912" class="">controls</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, since we have <st data-num="2919" class="">concluded</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">Christ</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="599" class="">died</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all;</st> <st data-num="686" class="">therefore</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> have <st data-num="599" class="">died</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="599" class="">died</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> those who <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> should <st data-num="3371">no longer</st> <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> for <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> for him who <st data-num="599" class="">died</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="5620">So then</st> <st data-num="575">from</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> on <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">acknowledge</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">from</st> an <st data-num="4561" class="">outward human point of view</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532">Even</st> <st data-num="1487">though</st> we have <st data-num="1097" class="">known</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">from</st> such a <st data-num="4561">human point of view</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> we do not <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> him in that way <st data-num="3765">any longer</st>.

<st data-num="5620">So then</st>, <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> is <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, he is a <st data-num="2537" class="">new</st> <st data-num="2937" class="">creation;</st> what is <st data-num="744" class="">old</st> has <st data-num="3928">passed away</st><n id="1" />—<st data-num="2400" class="">look</st>, what is <st data-num="2537" class="">new</st><n id="2" /> has <st data-num="1096" class="">come</st>!<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3959">all these things</st> are <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> who <st data-num="2644" class="">reconciled</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> to <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> who has <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> the <st data-num="1248" class="">ministry</st> of <st data-num="2643" class="">reconciliation</st>.

<st data-num="5613 3754">In other words</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="2644" class="">reconciling</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> to <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>, <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3049" class="">counting</st> <st data-num="846" class="">people’s</st> <st data-num="3900" class="">trespasses</st> against <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he has <st data-num="5087" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> of <st data-num="2643" class="">reconciliation</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> we are <st data-num="4243" class="">ambassadors</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, as <st data-num="5613" class="">though</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> were <st data-num="3870">making his plea</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>. We <st data-num="1189" class="">plead</st> with you<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5228" class="">on</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ’s</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">behalf</st>, “Be <st data-num="2644" class="">reconciled</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>!”
God made the one who did not know sin to be sin for us, so that in him we would become the righteousness of God.
